name: Home Loan
shortDescription: There's nothing quite like owning your own home. Nedbank's home loan products can help make this happen for you.

requiredDocuments.attributeName: Your financial details - income, expenses, assets and liabilities.
Your Nedbank bond account number - if you're applying for a further loan or readvance.
A copy of your barcoded ID or Smart Card ID - ensure you have a legible, clear copy of both sides of the card.

A signed offer to purchase - this is required only if you are buying a new home. If you are switching your existing bond to Nedbank, or are applying for a further loan or readvance, this isn't needed.
